description: ANK — Art Nikita Kotov ////// Digital artist, graphic and ux/ui designer. I write canvases in which I convey my experience, manifestos and momentary states =)  ////// In Instagram, you can see more works that I plan to put up for sale. Later I plan to make physical copies in A3 format.  ////// I will be glad to have long-term cooperation and communication with other authors and collectors! //////
